content.rendered:
[vc_row et_full_width=”true” et_row_padding=”true”][vc_column]

COOL N LITE X PRESTIGE

Prestige Motorcars

COOL N LITE X PRESTIGE

Prestige Motorcars

COOL N LITE X PRESTIGE

Prestige Motorcars

COOL N LITE X PRESTIGE

Prestige Motorcars

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1650936132223{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”35px”]

Book A Service
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” el_class=”align-justify” css=”.vc_custom_1580960231603{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1539990076074{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”animation fade-in”]

Window Film

PERFORMANCE HIGH TECH FILMS

Automotive Series

Designed and developed for maximum performance and durability. They can withstand extreme temperatures and vast amounts of direct sun exposure that automobiles receive on a daily basis, especially in tropical heat. You will immediately notice that glare reduction is greatly enhanced upon installation, thus, enabling you to drive with less effort during a warm sunny day.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space][vc_separator color=”white” el_width=”80″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” el_class=”align-justify” css=”.vc_custom_1580960231603{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1539990076074{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”animation fade-in”]

Paint Protection Film

CrystGard™️

paint protection film is probably the most effective way of protecting your vehicles from road damages such as stone chips, debris and scratches. CrystGard™️ is now even better with an enhancement patented super-hydrophobic and self healing element. This patented acrylic adhesive paint protection is designed to protect cars, motorcycles, trucks, vans, boats, watercraft and other types of vehicles with precision laser cut techonlogy and extreme flexibility for extreme curves. CrystGard™️ forms invisible exterior protection that can be waxed and maintained just like your paint to maintain the original high gloss shine of modern vehicles.​[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_separator color=”white” el_width=”80″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” el_class=”align-justify” css=”.vc_custom_1580960231603{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1539990076074{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”animation fade-in”]

CNL Garage

Coating

CNL GARAGE focuses more on car body care, such as waxing the glass, washing the entire car body thoroughly, Cleaning the interior, multiple steps of paint correction removing scratches and swirls also making the paint shinier with extra Diamond Coating Layers and include engine bay cleaning.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg”][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
